items.content_html: A lightweight scraper that extracts pages of job information from hk.jobsdb.com and th.jobsdb.com into to a JSON file.
items.title: krishgalani/jobsdb-scraper: A lightweight scraper that extracts pages of job information from hk.jobsdb.com and th.jobsdb.com into to a JSON file.

items.content_html: SmartEnvSwitcher is a lightweight Node.js library for managing environment variables across multiple environments, such as development, staging, and production. It simplifies the process of switching between environments and updating `.env` files programmatically.
items.title: Amit2197/smart-env-switcher: SmartEnvSwitcher is a lightweight Node.js library for managing environment variables across multiple environments, such as development, staging, and production. It simplifies the process of switching between environments and updating `.env` files programmatically.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: Craft is a lightweight, flexible design system for building responsive layouts in React and handling prose.

items.content_html: Injectly is a simple, self-hosted code injector app designed to streamline the process of managing and injecting scripts across multiple websites.

items.content_html: Market Depth Generator is a lightweight library for simulating market depth, trade data, and OHLC candlesticks. Designed for trading platforms and financial applications, it generates realistic trading data with customizable configurations.
items.title: monupareeklg/trade-data-generator: Market Depth Generator is a lightweight library for simulating market depth, trade data, and OHLC candlesticks. Designed for trading platforms and financial applications, it generates realistic trading data with customizable configurations.

items.content_html: ChatNest is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-integrate JavaScript widget for adding chat functionality to your web applications. It comes with a flexible configuration system, allowing you to tailor the chatbot's appearance and behavior to suit your app's needs.
items.title: Pro-Sifat-Hasan/chatnest: ChatNest is a lightweight, customizable, and easy-to-integrate JavaScript widget for adding chat functionality to your web applications. It comes with a flexible configuration system, allowing you to tailor the chatbot's appearance and behavior to suit your app's needs.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
